submapp.som.Som.print_weights_pca_axis¶

Som.print_weights_pca_axis(data, is_standardized=False)¶

Print the weights of the map on first two axis of the PCA

This is a visual way to check out how the map is actually deploying on the data. Note that the interpretation really depends on the quality of the projection on first two axis of the PCA.

Parameters

  • data (np.ndarray[float, float], shape = (_,p)) – Matrix whose element are the data stardized or not on which we will apply the PCA. The matrix should not distinguish the years, you can use np.concatenate to get rid of the years.

  • is_standardized – Set to true if the data passed in argument is standardized, else false. Default to false. If it is set to false, then the data is standardized.

Return type

None
